page.title: 05Clubs in Priors Marston
page.content: 1.{Priors Sports Club.}Club house & field, Byfield Road. Football, Cricket (Ladies' & Men's teams), Tug of War, Darts, Pool. 2.{Women's Institute.}40 members meet monthly, 3rd Wednesday evening, Village Hall. 3.{Darby & Joan Club.} members meet monthly, 1st Tuesday afternoon, Village Hall. 4.{Mothers Union.}15 members meet monthly, 2nd Tuesday, members homes. 5.{Priors Gardeners Club.}Affiliated to Royal Horticultural Society. Annual show for garden produce & home baking, Village Hall. Occasional visits to gardens of interest. 6.{Friends of Priors Marston School, raise funds for equipment & functions. 7.{Bell Ringers.}10 campanologists practise every Monday evening. Church & Hand Bells.
